SEARCH
Package com.peaslimited.shoppeas.repository.implementation

Class WholesalerRepositoryImpl

java.lang.Object
com.peaslimited.shoppeas.repository.implementation.WholesalerRepositoryImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
WholesalerRepository
@Repository public class WholesalerRepositoryImpl extends Object implements WholesalerRepository
Implementation of WholesalerRepository for performing operations on wholesaler data in Firestore, including methods to retrieve, add, update, and manage wholesaler information.
